DOC.brief_summary: Open-label comparison standard 12-week regimen varenicline standard 10-week regimen transdermal nicotine patch smoking cessation .
DOC.brief_title: An Open Label Study That Compares Varenicline Transdermal Nicotine Patch Smoking Cessation
DOC.criteria: Subjects must smoke average least 15 cigarette per day past year month prior screen visit , period abstinence great 3 month past year . Subjects clinically significant cardiovascular disease past 6 month .
